website_summaries.verdict: This stylish 12,000 BTU model is more energy efficient than other models of comparable power, and has the cooling power to handle most large rooms in an average home.
pros: While any powerful AC will cause a larger power bill, users report that this unit is more energy efficient than other 12,000 BTU models we considered, while accomplishing the same task of cooling rooms up to 300 sq
The dehumidifier removes 1.2 pints of moisture, which is less than LG's other large unit, making this a good option for less humid climates
cons: While the unit can be moved between rooms using the casters, draining this heavy model may require two people to lift the unit

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this air conditioner back in 2016 to help cool down the house a few months after my son was born. We pulled it out this summer to use and it’s leaking! It leaked all over my wood floors! At first it was just a little bit of water, but now we have to keep a tray under it because the amount of water that comes out of it soaks an entire towel! I’m so disappointed because when we bought it we paid $500! We should have just used that money towards a central air unit! What a waste! And we cleaned it and stored it in our spare bedroom every winter!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: HONEYMOON to DIVORCE < 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in summer 2016 and loved it. I installed in 10inutes and was done. Worked well summer 2017. I saw a small amount to of water on floor and figured it needed to be drained nothing realy came out. I was having a dinner party during thanksgiving and decided to turn it on to cool the room after all the cooking. This resulted in flooding my entire dining room in an hour. Where the water cam from I have no idea since there is little humidity in NY in November.
customer_reviews.author: shaywelch

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with this unit
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this unit. It took about 15 or 20 minutes to set up. It was 118 degrees this past weekend in Arizona and within minutes the room was cooled down to 65 degrees. Occasionally there are random noises coming from inside the unit, the lights on the display are bright as well. Over all this unit works great.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Moore

customer_reviews.title: Repair support is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I like how much air it kicks out. The auto swing feature is also a nice touch. The black color is not very common either, which was nice to find. My unit stopped working though after a couple months. The compressor sounds like it's running, but doesn't blow out cold air. Been trying to find someone to repair it, but it's been about two weeks now. LG still has not repaired my unit. Sweltering in my apartment and they just keep telling me to wait. Ridiculous how long it's taking to just find someone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I own other similar air conditioners, they automatically signal to drain the water and shut off as this one is supposed to do, it leaked all over the floor and damaged the floor and ceiling below, I do not know why it does this but it did not start to do it until a month after I purchased it, I even would drain the water plug before the signal to do so and a little water would drip out but wow, the amount that was leaking under the air conditioner was ridiculous. Too late to return it now so I am stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Dragos

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Bought this barely over a year ago It worked pretty well for the first year Which is under warranty Basically as soon as the warranty ended, so did the AC. Super annoying after spending a pretty penny on an AC. I should’ve just bought like a $100 AC locally but this seemed like such a nice unit.. Super bummed It’s so hot in NYC & now I’m scared to leave my dog for even an hour because if she leaves my room (where the ac works) she will be in the living room with this. That doesn’t work. Only the fan works. Which does no good with humidity and living on the top floor of a unit (heat rises)
customer_reviews.author: Mincoco

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Like many people here, mine worked fine for a few months and now it makes this awful fan spinning noise. Yes, it still cools but I am unable to even be around it let alone watch tv because the noise is so incredibly loud!! And honestly, I don’t know how energy efficient it is, if the few times I’ve used it it made the lights in my house flicker like crazy. I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Camille V.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box, and the diffuser fell off of the hose. Part of the hose appears to be damaged on both ends, so I just had to use the hose without the diffuser. I called LG customer service, and they tried to tell me to just shove the diffuser back on, despite me telling them part of the hose was missing to keep the diffuser on
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic AC for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We have about a 410 sq ft living/ dining room. It gets about 105-110 here in the summer. We have used it in 100 degrees already and it keeps our living room completely comfortable. It sets to 60 but realistically our living room is about 75 on a really hot day. Have not received an electric bill to see if it has saved us any money quite yet. It is not too loud either. We run this and a box fan to keep good circulation and the box fan is WAY louder.
customer_reviews.author: acurtis

customer_reviews.title: I don't fully understand why, but I used this ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't fully understand why, but I used this thing for 3 months straight, and NEVER emptied a tank. It was so hot , and my central AC crapped out. bought this one, but wasn't really sure about if it was going to be a pain in the ass or not, having to empty the tank every day. I read some mixed reviews, and people were complaining about having to empty the tank often. I can honestly say to this day I have no idea how to empty the tank, because the unit just never shut off. damn think was magic or something.
customer_reviews.author: Tauk Tauk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Can you say amazing! It is been a while since I bought this AC, I wanted to be sure it was going to work right. I have an office about 10x15 loaded with servers that run 24x7. This poor thing has not stopped running since I plugged it in. The only thing I recommend is, if you are going to run it non stop? Set is in a hot water heater pan with drainage. It will sweat and the drain plug needs to be connected to a hose. Now this is for my application. For a portable unit that you might carry to work? You can not beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: This was our first experience with a portable air conditioner and it has been great - so much easier to install than the window ones and we can move it to another area of the house if we need to. For now it is doing just fine on the first floor, actually cooling 3 rooms, living room, kitchen, and dining room. The controls are easy and it is not too loud. This was a good purchase in the heat of the summer and we have recommended this to friends already.
customer_reviews.author: J.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Worked once
customer_reviews.text: Worked once last year. However, this year this AC is not cooling the room even after I did so many research, tried so many methods,turned it on for days. It breaks my heart. I prefer stay in my car all day then eat an ice cream shaking to death than live in a room let this thing turns me into bacon!!
customer_reviews.author: Garburator

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find...BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Had to look around A LOT to find this one again. Replacing one I had that was exact same model. The last lasted 3 or 4 years being run almost constantly in the Summer and early Spring and Fall. The ONLY portable AC I could find that had great ratings and FRONT vents that would oscillate up and down and could being set to any position in the range of motion. The remote is fantastic. Am using this in my garage blowing on my recliner. The reviews were pretty accurate. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: I like that the unit shuts off and cycles under "Energy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well (however is my first day of ownership so I'll update later). My midsize basement is now sweater weather and it's 90F outside. I like that the unit shuts off and cycles under "Energy Saver" instead of running constantly like a window unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Portable cooler that works
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Works pretty good for our living room, which is about 14 feet by 20 feet. Need to have a window that you can run the duct pipe to. We have a double hung window that works great for that. Can be moved around the room, as long as you have a window about 3 feet from the unit. Not as pretty as a permanent window unit, but works fine for us as we only need it about a half dozen days a year.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Griesshaber

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit July 12th. It worked great with no issues until last week. Last week it started blowing cool/not cold air and would fill up with water in under an hour and shut off. The water that is coming out has rust chips in it. This was happening on the Cool setting, not Dry. Put in a request with LG. Two days later they called me back stating a technician would need to come out. The technician may need to order parts so that could take a couple of weeks. We are in the middle of a heat wave. Being under 2 months old they should just replace the unit.
customer_reviews.author: MPC

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for FLOODING
customer_reviews.text: Kind of loud but worked fine cooling a large bedroom for 1.5 summer season (only running it 2- 3 days a week). I didn't find it having to drain the water often until this season, I kept finding my hard wood floor flooded from this unit. Got the drain hose, I can't believe just how much water that comes out through the pipe, and it STILL collects water inside the machine flooding my floors constantly! Judging from the reviews left by others, it sounds like it's not even worth trying to get it serviced. Ruined floors, hot summer, in search of a new ac unit 😤
customer_reviews.author: Shanon Park

customer_reviews.title: Stopped blowing cold air days after the 1 year warranty expired!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first year but second year no cold air. 2nd review. Went and looked for every possible recommendation to trouble shoot. Still no cold air. The thing is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this LG AC Unit. It is a very bad product and a waste of money. I had bought and used it for several months and water constantly leaked out on the floor. I had leveled it and even ran a drainage hose in the back of the device.
customer_reviews.author: DaFinite

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in cracked duct
customer_reviews.text: Imagine my surprise going to the window and feeling a blast of hot air. Plastic exhaust duct cracked both ends, very fragile/brittle. Works out to one season and one month. Only source for new duct is $150. I just hope it is better quality. I must admit that Gorilla Tape fixes the issue, but I expected better of LG.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted, which wasn’t long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this AC exactly 2 years ago. It worked fantastically the first and second summers and I would have given it 5 stars at that time. Just got it out to get ready for upcoming heat, and it doesn’t work at all. It’s out of warranty, so now I get the joy of paying to haul it to the dump. I live in a cool climate, and used it maybe 10-15 times for the past 2 summers. I feel like if you pay $400 for an AC, you should get more than 25 uses out of it. Yes, I’m bitter.
customer_reviews.author: ShiKennedy

customer_reviews.title: Does LG's warranty have any meaning??
customer_reviews.text: The remote on my portable air conditioner stopped working, fortunately while the product was still under its one-year LG no longer makes this model, so no longer supplies the part. The agent wanted me to use the cell phone app instead. I insisted that I need the remote, so after a phone call of half hour or more, he is moving this problem up the food chain. I am supposed to hear back within two business days. Will LG stand by its warranty? And after the warranty period, is my relatively new machine an unserviceable throwaway? Too bad, I like this machine, but I am unlikely to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Sicular

customer_reviews.title: Invest in another product!
customer_reviews.text: So sad that this item does not work. I tried to give it a chance but the AC failed miserably!!!I originally bough this AC to put in a 13 by 14 foot room but it didn't cool it one bit even after being on for 6 hours ( this AC should cool a 20x20 ft room). I then moved EVERYTHING to smaller room, and it still did not cool >:[ You have to sit directly in front of it in order to feel anything. I will be sending this item back!
customer_reviews.author: angelica brambila

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April before the heatwaves hit and I'm so glad I did. This works perfectly for my 10x11 room. Some people may think it's too loud (during sleep) but I usually have white noise during my sleep hours, so doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect a/c
customer_reviews.text: We had another brand portable a/c, it was ok but it didn’t last long and the smell from it was bad. We bought this one this past summer and couldn’t be happier. Yes it makes noise, but it’s not LOUD. If you like some background noise for sleep it has just the right amount. It’s self cleaning, which is awesome and never has a bad smell to it. Works great too!
customer_reviews.author: J.L.O.

customer_reviews.title: Good In A/C Mode, Loud in Fan
customer_reviews.text: Compared to another portable air conditioner I've owned, in the air conditioning mode this is much quieter. However, and the reason it only gets 4 stars, in the fan mode, this is louder than the air conditioning mode. I don't understand why. It seems it could have been much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: By CJs Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Leaks common problem dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: This immediately started leaking out of the bottom of the unit and makes a lot of clinky noises. This is $$ to then have to find a solution to the leaking. Water leaked all over my brand new wood floors. Very disappointed in this unit. Seems like this is a common issue in reading other posts and other online reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: LG 12000 BTU Air Conditioner - Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: i returned this unit back to Amazon because I was extremely disappointed with this LG 12000 BTU Air Conditioner. I set up this unit according to the manufacturer supplied instructions. When it was turned on all it did was blow warm air. In addition, when I set the fan speed to F3 it would change to the other speeds without any action on my part. It was obvious the unit was defected. I re-packed in the original shipping box and returned it. This was my first purchase of an LG appliance and will not buy anything from LG again or recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W Morelli

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this unit. we bought two. great price and came with window necessities. cools our bedroom, which is 250 square feet relatively quickly. our living room is very open, like 300 square feet with no door into dining area and kitchen and if you are sitting in there it is comfy!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: the are awesome!! The boys love them and subsequently enjoy ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in Cali and the drought is killing my two sons who have moved out of the house in to non-AC apartments, they started hanging around my AC home so I quickly fixed this situation by buying 2 units for each apt. I choose this brand and model strictly by the reviews, the are awesome!! The boys love them and subsequently enjoy their spot and come to visit. I can highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: dr. lynne

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy installation!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I read the reviews through and was hoping it was as good as everyone said. Just got it today, and let me just say, the installation couldn’t have been any easier!!! So far so good!!! I’ll update my review if I have any troubles, but it’s running as we speak. Has been for about a half hour and my room has gone down 4 degrees so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have another LG which has worked well for 10 years. The $3000 cooler for my wine cellar died, so I thought I would try it and it is keeping the room nice and cool at 62 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wetherille

customer_reviews.title: I purchased my unit in 2016 and have enjoyed 2 summers now and it works great with zero ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprised to see a lot of negative reviews. I purchased my unit in 2016 and have enjoyed 2 summers now and it works great with zero issues. I live in Montana so there is no humidity, maybe that is why I do not have to drain it / have water leaking issues. Keeps a large room, or even the entire upstairs ice cold!
customer_reviews.author: Ian D.

customer_reviews.title: Works well even though the box came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box came damaged but the air conditioner works well. It is noisy but I don't mind having "white noise" running at night. The exhaust hose does get hot though so had to wrap ours with a towel.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ E.

customer_reviews.title: Portable A/C
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, bought for the in laws because the heat this year has been extreme even in the north country. They love it, hubby liked it so much he had me order another one for us.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Cool and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This product is very powerful and could cooldown the master's bedroom in a short time with this hot summer in Florida. My only complain is that it is very noisy that you have to crank up the volume of the tv to hear the conversation. The noise is tolerable for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Walter T

customer_reviews.title: Product Received!
customer_reviews.text: Product Received! Super sale, Super deal and Super fast Shipping! Will Buy Again!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very very very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: In April it started to leak from the bottom of the unit. When I called in they said it only had a 30 day warranty. I feel like I just threw my money right out the window. Now I have to call somebody in to have it fixed and who knows how much that's going to cost! I would never buy another one of these LG portable ACs again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's office and it is working great. We live in the SF Bay area but we have been experiencing warmer weather for more days of the year and we needed a room air conditioner. Easy to set up and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dean M. Morier

customer_reviews.title: It conditions air.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what else there is to say, it's 100 degrees outside and this thing is pumping out ice cold air. It's only a few days old, but if it lasts, this thing is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst A/C unit I've had
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst A/C unit I've had.....somewhat adequate.....thought it would be more convenient if I could move it round my joint...haven't done that yet. Hose length not too bad...cord should have been longer. Won't cool a large room if you're too lazy like to to figure square yardage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Louis Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one season
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one season of use. Really disappointing for a 400$ purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: however it seems that it does great when its between 80 and 90 degrees outside
customer_reviews.text: We use this unit in a room slightly smaller than the dimensions suggested, however it seems that it does great when its between 80 and 90 degrees outside, but over 90 it just poops out and seems to put off an insane amount of heat even with the tube venting the heat outside.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Came with everything I needed to set it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Came with everything I needed to set it up. Was able to get a good seal in a sideways sliding window. I'm glad the window inserts were white, as the HOA at my condo would have had an issue with any other color. I've been using it on 'Cool' as it isn't very humid where I live. Works great and I don't have to worry about emptying water.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Farstryder

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: does a weird thing with turning off sometimes but all in all its a good product
customer_reviews.author: V Cole

customer_reviews.title: Missing window piece
customer_reviews.text: The AC works great. It came missing the piece to block off the window. Very irritating to spend that much and not everything was carefully included.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for those hot summer days
customer_reviews.text: Works great and runs well. We use it every day especially with the constant high temps these days. My only complaint is that it's a bit loud when it switches on and off automatically especially in energy saver mode.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a lower than average price
customer_reviews.text: Not loud at all imo but I like the white noise of a fan so I may not be the best judge on that. During the summer I ran it about 7-8 hrs a day on low and my energy bill went up about $45. Pretty efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Bashi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes a difference on the second floor but only in the room
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Walker

customer_reviews.title: What I love about this unit is the self evaporation
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this unit is the self evaporation. Never have to put in a drain line for condensation. I live by the ocean with high humidity and never had a problem. I have had other brands "Haier" and had to run a drain line outside. No problems with the LG so far. I have two of these and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Ok for large space.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Easy installation. We have a large bedroom that was an attic converted into a bedroom space. So the ceilings are very high and it's difficult to keep cool in the blazing Maryland summer. This little guy has been keeping us cool for about a month now with no trouble. If anything changes, I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works Great and was a true Lifesaver this summer from San Diego!! Humidity Blows!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kboy24

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, buying another one for another room. We are done lifting heavy ACs in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Quality Buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this AC works very well cools just right. As good as one can expect from a portable
customer_reviews.author: Jesus L.

customer_reviews.title: ARE YOU F$&@ING KIDDING ME
customer_reviews.text: THE UNIT I GOT DOES NOT WORK. It's not blowing cold air. The left side blows regular temp air and the right side blows somewhat hot air. Im trying to have it repaired here at home by an LG repairman since it has a one year warranty than go through the hassle of returning it and waiting for the next one to arrive. I also read in one of the reviews here that they got theirs replaced with another bad one. Im just very frustrated given that i paid $420 for a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Jule michael v obregon

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My Honeywell 10K BTU pooped out after 2 yrs--it wouldn't get very cold anymore. Fortunately, they honored the warranty and gave me a full refund. This time around, I checked the online reviews better than I did the first time. Initial impressions the new LG 12K BTU -- it seems much better designed and more solid than the Honeywell, plus much quieter. The unit is a little heavier but I think it will be easier to use & maintain in the long run. All refrigeration systems can suffer from random deterioration in the compressor--sometimes you just get bad luck, so let's see what happens in a couple of years!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W

customer_reviews.title: It gets cold!
customer_reviews.text: We live on a military base and the housing does not provide air conditioning because we have the “ocean breeze”. It got way too hot this summer and our portable air condionter cools down the entire down stairs!
customer_reviews.author: Baylee

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely satisfied with this purchase. It is very quiet, and it delivers the goods. I'd read that installation on some units was exasperating, but I was able to do it easily and without stress.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 12x12 bedroom when it’s over 100 outside.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: I chose this model because it was supposed to be quiet. NOT !!! Very loud otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E. Bushong

customer_reviews.title: didn't give it 5 stars because it's a little noisier than I like and I don't like the glowing electronic panel
customer_reviews.text: Works well, didn't give it 5 stars because it's a little noisier than I like and I don't like the glowing electronic panel,whih gives off quite a it of light it's in my bedroom and I like it dark.
customer_reviews.author: tander

customer_reviews.title: GREAT A/C UNIT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great A/C unit at a great price! Works and cools great. Easy to set up and operate. The timer is a great option that let's you set a shut-off or turn-on time. I highly recommend purchasing this A/C.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Loud noise
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, no leaking and cools well. The only problem is that it make a rather loud noise. Note: I’ve only had it for a week. I will update my review if I face any other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Humoud Alsabah

customer_reviews.title: Already quit.
customer_reviews.text: Two months to the day and it has quit cooling. I can't return it since they shipped me a reconditioned one.I just lost $400.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burton

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! LIFE SAVER!!! Arrived quickly and was exactly what I needed, instructions were easy to follow and I am so happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandparents. It cools their small apartment, which consists of a small living room and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: C:\>DOS

customer_reviews.title: Wheel of the portable AC is broken!!
customer_reviews.text: I found that the wheel is broken of this portable AC when I received the product and open the package.
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This this keeps my bedroom ice cold on 110 F days when the rest of my house is 95 degrees. I work night shift so it is perfect while I sleep in my back room. It keeps my room at 60-65 degrees even on the hottest days. Installation took less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Allen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this A/C
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to install and had to rely on quite a bit of painters tape to hold the piece in the window. The tube area appears to release hot air into the room and does not cool off the space at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CMcN7

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the quietest life saver in the heat.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the quietest one i'm running in comparison to my Soleus Air 14K BTU. I can easily sleep with this on in my 12x12 room at the lowest fan speed. Filter is easy to clean out and i've only had to empty the water once since I've had it over a month ago. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have a Small bedroom barely 10x12 and it barely cools the room. Temperature never goes below 78.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Leaking water
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last one summer before a major leak and it is pouring water all over the floor
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Cox

customer_reviews.title: Freezes up
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months, AC keeps frosting and developing ice over radiator fins, thus can no longer cool. Temperature would never drop below 70 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This unit works great..
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great....for a few months. This was my second unit, as the first one was defective and returned. After a few months of use, it started leaking water from the bottom of the pan. And now I learn it's out of warranty. What garbage.
customer_reviews.author: S  Concannon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cools about like a 10k window unit but at about 90db. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Grunow

customer_reviews.title: Is a great AC, same as other reviews the ac came ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a great AC, same as other reviews the ac came with some broken fan blades i guess they don't package it too well. Then again i did buy a opened box unit.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Blows warm air...defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: It blows warm air....does not work. The unit shipped quickly from Amazon and arrived in good condition. The unit itself looked nice and set up was simple. I bought this in anticipation of warm weather that was forthcoming. I plugged it in and turned it on and everything worked as expected except that it blows warm air. I could hear that the compressor kicked on, but it was not cooling the air....not even a little. I let it sit for a few hours and ran it again, but no difference. I ran it for a day, but it essentially served as a "fan" and not an air conditioner. Needless to say, we were very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas From Naperville

customer_reviews.text: Easy set up! Comes w all parts needed. Cools a large living room. Good buy!

customer_reviews.title: When an AC shows up like that, it means the compressor is cracked
customer_reviews.text: Most of the time when something shows up at my door pre-lubed and slippery I just assume I made a blackout drunk Grindr date. When an AC shows up like that, it means the compressor is cracked, the freon and lubricant have leaked out, and you just purchased a 400 dollar fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Dolan

product_meta.title: LG Portable Air Conditioner with LCD Remote Control | 115V for rooms up to 400 Sq. Ft. | LP1215GXR model
product_meta.description: LG's 115V Portable Air Conditioner with LCD remote control is the ideal climate-control solution for when you’re on the go - room to room, house to house or home to work, the installation is quick and easy. The innovative dehumidification function mixes cool dry air with the warm air to keep you comfortable and prevent over-cooling. The oscillating air vent technology circulates the dispersed air more efficiently, so no hot spot will be left untouched. Plus, with the programmable 24-hour on/off timer, you can control the temperature even when you're not there! In October 2017, the Department of Energy implemented a new test procedure to determine the BTU rating of portable air conditioners. The procedural change has adjusted the amount of BTUs allowed to be claimed downward by as much as 50%. There have been no internal changes to these units, and the functionality remains the same.Dry Air Flow (CFM) - 255cooling power:12000
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One LG LP1215GXR Portable Air conditioner with wheels, one Remote Control and window installation kit
Air conditioner dimensions: 14.33” W x 32.76” H x 15.59” D | Weight – 61.7 lbs. | Voltage – 115 | dBA level (Indoor/Outdoor) – 56
Performance: 12,000 BTU | Dehumidification: 1.2 pints/hr. | Estimated cooling area of 400-sq.ft | Dry air flow (CFM) – 255
Dehumidification function mixes cool dry air with the warm air
Please refer the user manuals below for more information on how to use, and pre-installation requirements
